Title: Establishes the New York baby opportunity fund
Summary: Establishes the New York baby opportunity fund which deposits $1,000 into an account managed by the state comptroller to be available to eligible children when they reach the age of 18; provides such funds be used for education costs, the purchase of real estate, or entrepreneurship.
LawCode: Add ยง78-c, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the state finance law, in relation to establishing the New York baby opportunity fund
